title: An Act in support of veterans and dependents through municipal tax bills

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Cusack of Braintree, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3834) of Mark J. Cusack relative to voluntary contribution check-off boxes on municipal tax bills for support of local veterans’ agents.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/28/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:10 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                        and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
